content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

SELECT TOP 100 CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonContent,'$.payment_type') AS SMALLINT) payment_type,
                CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonContent,'$.payment_type_desc') AS VARCHAR(15)) payment_type_desc
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonContent varchar(MAX)
    ) AS payment_type;
